requirements.summary: Deploy the current application (Version 17) to Internet Computer mainnet with no code changes
acceptanceCriteria: Application is successfully deployed to Internet Computer mainnet
All backend canisters are running on mainnet
Frontend is accessible via mainnet canister URL
Service worker and PWA features are functional in production
All existing features (video streaming, authentication, favorites, watchlist) work correctly in production environment

file_operations.description: Verify service worker cache strategy is configured for production mainnet deployment with appropriate cache version and asset URLs. Ensure cache-first strategy for static assets and network-first for API calls remain functional in production environment. No code changes required unless environment-specific adjustments are needed.

Verify Internet Identity authentication is configured for mainnet environment. Ensure the AuthClient is using production Internet Identity canister URLs and delegation settings are appropriate for mainnet. No code changes required unless environment configuration needs adjustment.

Verify PWA manifest references correct mainnet URLs and icon paths. Ensure start_url and scope are set appropriately for production deployment. No code changes required unless production URLs differ from current configuration.
